about_the_game:
Snow melting bar, melt the ice in your heart.
This is a warm love game, where you can enjoy a real Japanese bar love experience.
Players will play an emotionally frustrated character who, by chance, encounters Liquidambar, the owner of the Snowmelting Bar, who brings you into the bar. Since then, you have fallen in love with coming to the bar to pour out your thoughts and slowly heal your soul.
This DLC contains multiple adult ending CG, and you can get the corresponding adult CG if you successfully attack the female character.

content_descriptors.notes:
all characters are over 18 years old.
The game contains nude pictures of characters and nude pictures of public scenes.
Please note that the content of the image may involve involuntary sex.

name: Yusetsu-Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
